amendatorysection.para: The department shall provide an annual report, no later than December 1, to the Governor and the Legislature on the operation of the Children and Family Support Hotline established under section 71-822, the Family Navigator Program established under section 71-823, and the provision of voluntary post-adoption and post-guardianship case management services under section 71-824, except that for 2012, 2013, and 2014, the department shall also provide the report to the Health and Human Services Committee of the Legislature on or before September 15. The reports submitted to the Legislature and the committee shall be submitted electronically.
